Reference

All functions

sqlInterpolate(<Pool>) sqlParseVariables(<Pool>)

Safely interpolate values into an SQL string and parse them back.

dbQuoteIdentifier(<Pool>,<ANY>) dbUnquoteIdentifier(<Pool>) dbQuoteLiteral(<Pool>) dbQuoteString(<Pool>,<ANY>)

SQL quoting.

sqlData(<Pool>) sqlCreateTable(<Pool>) sqlAppendTable(<Pool>)

Creating and manipulating SQL tables.

dbBegin(<Pool>) dbCommit(<Pool>) dbRollback(<Pool>) dbWithTransaction(<Pool>)

DBIConnection transaction methods are not supported for Pool objects.

dbSendQuery(<Pool>) dbSendStatement(<Pool>,<ANY>) dbGetQuery(<Pool>,<character>) dbExecute(<Pool>,<character>) dbListResults(<Pool>) dbListFields(<Pool>,<character>) dbListTables(<Pool>) dbListObjects(<Pool>) dbReadTable(<Pool>,<character>) dbWriteTable(<Pool>,<ANY>) dbCreateTable(<Pool>) dbAppendTable(<Pool>) dbExistsTable(<Pool>,<ANY>) dbRemoveTable(<Pool>,<ANY>) dbIsReadOnly(<Pool>)

DBIConnection methods.

make.db.names(<Pool>,<character>) isSQLKeyword(<Pool>,<character>) SQLKeywords(<Pool>)

Make R identifiers into legal SQL identifiers.

dbDataType(<Pool>) dbGetInfo(<Pool>) dbIsValid(<Pool>)

DBIObject methods.

poolCreate() poolClose()

S4 class for compatibility with DBI methods

dbPool()

Create a DBI Database Connection Pool.

DBIConnection methods from dplyr and dbplyr

poolCheckout()

Checks out an object from the pool.

poolReturn()

Returns an object back to the pool.
